question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. one way sign
B. street signs
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The "one way" sign is physically mounted directly below the stop sign and street signs on the same pole, making it clearly closer to the camera in 3D space.
